original_ticket.subject: API rate limits unclear
original_ticket.message: Getting rate limited but documentation says we should have 1000 requests/hour. We'

router_output.summary: Customer reports API rate limit discrepancies with documentation.

data.customer_facing_response: Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you are experiencing discrepancies with your API rate limits. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Our documentation states a limit of 1000 requests per hour, however, it seems you are encountering rate limits sooner. To better understand and resolve this issue, could you please provide more details such as timestamps of when these limits were hit, the specific API endpoints used, and any error messages you received? This will help us investigate the issue more efficiently. In the meantime, we can temporarily increase your rate limit to ensure uninterrupted service.  We appreciate your understanding and patience while we look into this.
